issue.title: Simplify metadata edition toolbars and make them coherent with other views
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

## Goals:

* Simplify metadata edition toolbars
* Make them coherent with other views toolbars (look, colors, icons and labels)
* Since MD form can be a long page, duplicate the toolbar at top and bottom to ease access

## Enhancements

* 'Validate and save', 'save and close', 'save and continue', 'save and publish', 'in progress' (witch saves by the way) will be merged in a 'save' drop down with the standard look
* Less used tools : import, replicate, preview (XML & XHTML) and 'reset for'm will be placed under a 'tools' drop down
* The 'validate' button (that does not save but only triggers JS validation) is not very useful, we propose to remove it
* 'Return' will be named and look like all 'cancel' buttons in easySDI (Joomla's default)
* 'Collapse all/expand all' will be removed from the toolbar and be placed in the main 'well' (since it's not an action on MD it should not appear on MD toolbar)
* The buttons in the tool bar will of course appear depending of MD status and User rights
